dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is composed of 60,000 32×32 images of 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. In each experiment, the inliers are 6,000 images from one class and the outliers are 6,000 × p images randomly selected from the rest classes.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 consists of 60,000 32×32 images labeled according to 100 distinct categories. The inliers are 3,000 images from one superclass, and the outliers are 3,000 × p images randomly chosen from the rest of superclasses.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: L. Fei-Fei
R. Fergus
P. Perona
dcterms:description: Caltech 101 contains 9,146 images of 101 different classes. The inliers are 100 images from one certain class and the outliers are 100 × p images selected from the rest 10 classes at random.
dcterms:title: Caltech 101

dcterms:creator: K. Lang
dcterms:description: 20 Newsgroups is a text classification dataset with roughly 20,000 newsgroup documents, partitioned nearly evenly across 20 newsgroups. The inliers are 360 documents from a certain class, and the outliers are 360 × p documents randomly chosen from the rest classes.
dcterms:title: 20 Newsgroups

dcterms:creator: K. Lang
dcterms:description: Reuters-21578 is a text classification dataset containing 90 text categories with multi-labels. The inliers are the documents from a fixed class, and 360 × p outliers are sampled randomly from the remaining four classes.
dcterms:title: Reuters-21578

dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: Arrhythmia is a small-scale medical dataset containing attributes on the diagnosis of cardiac arrhythmia in patients. The dataset contains 16 classes, with 66 anomalies among 452 instances.
dcterms:title: Arrhythmia

dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: KDDCUP99 is a large-scale intrusion detection dataset. The dataset contains 97278 abnormal instances and 396743 normal ones, where the non-attack classes are treated as anomalies.
dcterms:title: KDDCUP99
